title: 119. Alternatives to Popular Third-Party Delivery Apps | Restaurant Recovery Series
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Tasso Roumeliotis, the founder of Numa. Numa is a company that provides text-based order placement services. Barron and Roumeliotis discuss the future of curbside pick-up, takeout, third party delivery, and dine-in eating.
